name: Frogalita
description:
Frogalita

Jump on ever-changing lily pads:

Catch elusive dragonflies:

Avoid annoying admirers:

Credits

Made for the Godot Fire Charity Jam 1.

  • Design/Programming/Art: Ricardo Buring
  • Music: Noémie Combe
  • Engine: Godot Engine

Controls

Use either of the following:

  • Touchscreen (recommended): Drag anywhere on screen and release to jump.
  • Mouse: Click anywhere, drag, and release mouse to jump.
  • Keyboard: Use [Left]/[Right] to aim, [Up]/[Down] to drag, and [Space] to jump.
  • Keyboard: Use [A]/[D] to aim, [W]/[S] to drag, and [Space] to jump.
